name: Xor Queries
questionText:
You are given an array arr of positive integers.
Q queries follow. Each query contains two integers, left and right. For each query compute the XOR of elements from left to right (that is, arr[left] XOR arr[left + 1] XOR ... XOR arr[right] ).
Print the result of each query as space separated integers
inputFormat:
• A single integer N (Size of the array)
  • N space separated integers
  • A single integer Q
  • Q space separated pairs of integers
outputFormat: Print Q space separated integers denoting answer of the Q queries.
explanation:
For the first query [1, 3], the XOR of elements from index 1 to 3 is 2 XOR 3 XOR 4 = 5
For the second query [0, 4], the XOR of elements from index 0 to 4 is 1 XOR 2 XOR 3 XOR 4 XOR 5 = 1
